comments.author: Stefan Will
comments.body: Proposed patch, as in the related bug #427 I only need this after a rewrite(), so this implementation assumes the query was rewritten beforehand.

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.body: Thanks Stefan, I just committed this.

description: The DisjunctionMaxQuery lacks an implementation of extractTerms().
summary: The DisjunctionMaxQuery lacks an implementation of extractTerms().
